array.string: identifier "$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)" and anchor apple generic and certificate 1[field.1.2.840.113635.100.6.2.6] /* exists */ and certificate leaf[field.1.2.840.113635.100.6.1.13] /* exists */ and certificate leaf[subject.OU] = "$(AppIdentifierPrefix)"

dict.string: scrobble.up needs the permission to get info about currently playing music.
